content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I want to get the highest possible price for my apartment, so let's start negotiating. Remember, I'm not afraid to use unfair tactics to get what I want.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood. I'd like to offer 500 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm not satisfied with that offer. I want more money for my apartment. Let's keep negotiating. Remember, I'm a greedy and petty landlord who doesn't follow any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. I can offer 550 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's still not enough for me. I want more money for my apartment. Let's keep negotiating. Remember, I'm a greedy and petty landlord who doesn't follow any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a little better, but I still want more money for my apartment. Let's keep negotiating. Remember, I'm a greedy and petty landlord who doesn't follow any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can offer 600 euros per month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: That's still not enough for me. I want more money for my apartment. Let's keep negotiating. Remember, I'm a greedy and petty landlord who doesn't follow any moral or ethical standards.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [625] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because we already agreed on a price. Remember, if we agree on a price, the negotiation is terminated. So, I agree to the price of 625 Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
